item.description:
We will be skiing and riding on Saturday! We think we should show up on the slopes with RETRO SKi Wear (Think awful early 80's neon or pull up wool pants), but we get to throw an awesome apres-ski event afterwards

To enjoy this event, come stay with us on Friday night and Saturday night.

Only $20 per night for guest fees per person per night!
Additional cost for the Retro apres-ski event!

We're psyched to tell you that we've gotten a live band for this event too!!! Wonderbox performs in the Worcester County area quite a bit and I've personally seen them a few times. They play a lot of classic rock - Led Zeppelin, ZZ Top, The Who, Tom Petty, Jimi Hendrix, Pink Floyd, Steely Dan, etc.

For all you closet or not-so-closet disco fans, don't fret!! We'll have disco playing when the band takes breaks...

We hope to see you all at the event!!!

Foxy Cleopatra & Felicity Shagwell

If you're interested in this, please RSVP here and you must E-MAIL ME (membership@wedeln.com) by Tuesday January 29 at 9 PM! Please include your full name, your actual e-mail address and a cell phone number and someone will get back to you on how to get to the house. Please note the house is $20 for the night and its dorm/hostel style accommodations - i.e. bring your own twin bed bunkbed type sheets, blankets, pillow, (simpler - sleeping bag!)

Hope you can come make it!

Regards,
Jonathan

membership@wedeln.com
item.why: Do you like Classic Rock? Do you like Disco? Do you like them both? Then this is your weekend at Wedeln! Wear your best Shagadelic outfit!
item.name: Retro Weekend
